lore:
After they ascended to godhood, Hexilo became Mortem and River became Tenebris. Together they created the Bastion of the Void, the only place that could contain the Voidlords' invasion of the world.

Despite their power over blood, Hemomancers are unable to use any of their abilities on the Titan.

During a new moon, Lunar Hemomancers can calm the emotions of any creature by touching an open wound on their body. Conversely, if this happens during a full moon, the emotions are amplified, causing their victim to lose control of themselves.
menagerieDialog: (You can tell by the cool and calculated look on its face that it's hatching a new, sinister scheme.)
There's no time to waste - let's go.
(It's pouring blood back and forth between two vials. Interesting hobby.)
(It stares at you in silence, refusing to say anything. How stubborn!)
What am I doing? The same thing I do every night, {PLAYERNAME}. Trying to take over the world!
name: Lunar Hemomancer
